title: shazde
author: shazde
content: We present the new Crypto Prediction Game Script with which you can create a cryptocurrency game site in Live price mode. With this product we assure you a revolutionary success in the Cryptocurrency gaming industry, get ready to offer a real gaming experience to your users.Main Features-Responsive Design ready for any device (Desktop, Tablet or Smartphone).-Friendly URLs.-Referral System -Automate global price-Well Documentated.-Admin can be increase and decrease price -Real/Test mode for player.-Google 2FA Included.-Google reCaptcha Included.-Dashboard Notifications.-Email Notifications.-Users Management (Registration, Login, 2FA Login, Password Recover, Email Verification).-Wallet Management (Send, Receive).-Real price gaming experience.-Prediction game.-Transactions History.-Support Tickets Management.-Account Settings-Profile Information.-Password Management.-Notifications Management.-Security Management.-Preferences.Requirements-Shared Hosting or VPS.-Hosting Control Panel (cPanel, VestaCP, Plesk and etc).-1 GB RAM (Recommended).-5 GB SDD DISK SPACE (Recommended).-Apache2 Web Server.-MySQL MariaDB Server.-PHP 8.0+ (Recommended).-PHP Extensions: mysqli, gmp, mcrypt, soap, curl.-SMTP Server.Demo :Crypto Prediction Game Script LoginUser - test@septom.comPass - test@septom.comPrice:1k Usdt Contact:https://t.me/septomteam
